body.p: With Square Payments, business owners can accept their customers paymemts virtualy anywhere.

row.entry: Business owners can accept their customers card payments through a phone or tablet with a Square card reader. Business owners with Square have transparent pricing, no long term comitents or weird fees, and one rate for every card that their customer swipes.

Busineness owners can simplify the way that they create and track invoices for their company. Square users can run their invoicinging busuiness on the go with and IOS and Android app. They also have acces to real time tracking, recurring billing, custom stimates, automatic payment reminders and more.
Business owners can also charge customer cards with Square's virtual terminal. If the customer is not there in person, employers can start taking payments in minutes and get their money quickly.
Business owners are able to create a free eCommerce website with intergrations, list their products, and set up Square payments for their company.
